title: What Our Clients Say
subheading: Here are some testimonials from our satisfied clients.

testimonials.label: Dream Come True
testimonials.content: All I ever wanted in life was to learn how to code, and with the Kit, everything became easier.
testimonials.author: Matheus Miranda, Campinas - SP.

testimonials.label: Code Rockstar
testimonials.content: 21 Miles is a code rockstar. I highly recommend it! :) It's also a very relaxed and communicative company. FIVE STARS!
testimonials.author: CEO, Figmenta, Milan - Italy.

testimonials.label: GOAT
testimonials.content: The market is flooded with low-experience developers, but 21 Miles is clearly on a different level, GOAT!
testimonials.author: CEO, CB, Lisbon - Portugal

testimonials.label: 21 Miles is very talented
testimonials.content: 21 Miles is very talented. I have hired them for several years and know them well. The quality of their technology is very high. I recommend them.
testimonials.author: CEO Green Hat Web Solutions, Denver - USA
